name: Talk Knight
_source: speak;SoldierBlue;Oh, uh, we were part of a convoy traveling into the swamp.{w}{br}But we got left behind...
speak;Simon;Well, by chance, I'm headed to the swamp myself.
speak;SoldierBlue;Ha! Now that's a good one.
speak;SoldierBlue;Take some advice: turn around and head on home.
speak;SoldierBlue;Look, between the miasma, the monsters and the bandits, your sorry band is toast.
